comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
A larger scan might help, but I believe this is LT Delta C. "Del" Graham Jr., 82nd Tactical Reconnaissance Squadron, 71st TRG. Officially credited with one confirmed aerial victory. Aircraft is P-39Q serial 42-20393.

Graham was KIA 1 March 1944.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/13935339@N05] Email me at arenga@sdasm.org and I can send you a higher res scan!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: After your send of the larger scan, and the fact that the back of the snapshot was annotated, "LT Graham," it's a sure bet this is Delta C. Graham, Jr.
